code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:f mason aged 21 ys presents with moderate fever of 3 weeks duration together with moderate fatigue, moderate cough. o:Height 153 cm, Weight 69 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14, persistent coughing during visit, HEENT: WNL, enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isoniazid - 100 mg tab, Rifampin - 10 mg/kg oral, and ordered Chest X-Ray.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

content2.Unmatched: WNL , enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes

td.content: s:a 22 year old white female presents with 10 months history of mild cough, mild fever and mild fatigue. she drinks alcohol occasionally Patient does not smoke o:Height 153 cm, Weight 69.7 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, HEENT: WNL, Pulm: effortless, all lung fields, enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isoniazid - 100 mg tab, and ordered PPD.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

content2.Unmatched: effortless , all lung fields , enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes , Heart = RRR , Normal S
